definitions.definition: Any flowering plant of the genus Geranium , of family Geraniaceae .
Any flowering plant of the genus Pelargonium , of family Geraniaceae .
A bright red color tinted with orange, like that of a scarlet geranium ( Pelargonium inquinans ) .

main_definition: ( strictly ) Any flowering plant of the genus Geranium , of family Geraniaceae .
secondary_definitions: ( loosely ) Any flowering plant of the genus Pelargonium , of family Geraniaceae .
A bright red color tinted with orange, like that of a scarlet geranium ( Pelargonium inquinans ) .
